Working Humidity: 0%-99%RH

Govee Bluetooth Indoor Thermo-Hygrometer
Monitor Your Air Where It Matters Most!

Bluetooth Connection

Up to 70m/230ft enabled control range

Accurate Data

Built-in Swiss-made sensor

Alert Notification

Up to 70m/230ft enabled control range

Data History

Export your data whenever you need it

Export Over 2 Year's Worth of Data for Free
Accurate & Fast
With a Swiss made sensor, temp and humidity measurements are accurate to ±0.54℉/±0.3℃ and ±3%RH, respectively.A 2s data refresh speed keeps you up-to-date with relevant readings.
Working Temp: -4℉-140℉
Temp Accuracy: ±0.54℉/±0.3℃
Working Humidity: 0%-99%RH
Temp Accuracy: ±0.3%RH
Alert Function
When temp or humidity levels fall out preset ranges, you will immediately receive an app alert and can react quickly to air quality changes in your terrariums or wine cellars.
Bluetooth Connection
Up to 70m/230ft enabled control range. Bluetooth connectivity allows you to remotely check and receive valuable data via the Govee Home app.
Long Battery Life
Enjoy over 500 days of continuous use

settings.title: · Can I assemble Govee Glide Wall Light in any shape I want?
settings.content: Govee Glide light is modular and contains 6 segment and 1 corner that can be assembled in any order you choose.

settings.title: · Will Govee Glide still function normally if I only assemble 4 of the segments together?
settings.content: Yes, you can assemble together as many or as few of the pieces as you wish (maximum 6 segments and 1 corner).

settings.title: · How do I connected the segments together?
settings.content: Line up the pins of one segment with the slot of the next segment and press down firmly until the segments “snap” into place.

settings.title: · How many preset scenes does Govee Glide have in total?
settings.content: There are a total of 40+ dynamic scenes with more to be added in the future through new App updates.

settings.title: · How many music modes does Govee Glide have in total?
settings.content: Glide has 6 reactive music modes which can move to the beat of your music.

settings.title: · Why can’t I find & add my Govee Glide in Govee Home App?
settings.content: Make sure your smartphone’s Bluetooth is switched and your Govee Glide is plugged into power. On the My Devices home screen of the Govee Home App, press “+” in the upper right corner and search “Glide” or find Bluetooth devices near by.

settings.title: · Can Govee Glide work with Alexa and Google Home?
settings.content: Yes, Glide can be voice controlled via Alexa and Google Home via Wi-Fi.
